page.title: 03LIVING IN ALVA
page.content: A small survey showed that people choose to live Alva for three main reasons. There is a good choice of {housing}at reasonble prices. Alva is a quiet place and attractive with the hills and glens behind it. People whose{jobs}are not in Alva find it quite easy to reach their work. The airports at Glasgow and Edinburgh can be reached in less than an hour. People who have to travel around in their work find Alva's position in Central Scotland very useful. Another survey showed that{home life}in Alva could be improved if there were special{shops}which sold things like books,records and shoes. People would also like a restaurant.
